name: Color Board Puzzles - Fastest Finger on Tile Challenge Game
name_original: Color Board Puzzles - Fastest Finger on Tile Challenge Game
description:
******************************************************
Color Board is fun Puzzle game. It's race against time, its race to be fastest in world. This game would test your reflexes. Do you have fastest moving finger on board? Think again and keep playing.

Each Color Board Puzzle presents set of tiles that you need to move. Arrange tiles of same color in same row or column as per puzzle. As you keep solving puzzles board gets more and more complex.
Beat the timer and be fastest moving finger in world.
Play this simple and fun game.

*******************************************************
